reasoning.keyword_integration: Front-loads 'Neoprene Dumbbell Set' and 'Hand Weights Dumbbells Set' to capture 'weights dumbbells set' and 'dumbbell set'. Includes 'weights set', 'gym equipment', 'for home use', and 'hand weights' to cover high-volume phrases while staying natural.
